intro.description: This cheat sheet will show you how to submit a grid job.

item.title: Open the g-Eclipse user perspective
item.description: If you are not already in the g-Eclipse user perspective, in the main menu select Window > Open Perspective > g-Eclipse (User) or click on the "Click to Perform" link below.

item.title: Select the job description file and submit it.
item.description:
Right-click on the job description file in the Job Description folder and choose Submit....
In opened wizard choose type of job you want to submit.
Press button Finish to submit a job.
